actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish an Office of Constituent Assistance, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Office of Constituent Assistance Act - Establishes in the legislative branch the Office of Constituent Assistance to: (1) assist Members of Congress in responding to the concerns and grievances of their constituents regarding agency actions; (2) receive cases from Members in order to improve constituent service and avoid the appearance of impropriety or conflict of interest; (3) identity issues that appear to pose problems for constituents on a continuing, broadscale basis, and to formulate remedial action, if appropriate; and (4) alert Members, congressional committees, and agency officials to possible patterns of abuse or inefficiency. Sets forth responsibilities, reporting requirements, and administrative provisions for such Office. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to establish an Office of Constituent Assistance, and for other purposes.
